reviewText: Enjoyed this movie very much.  Jeff Fahey gave a great performance, as usual.  Very underated actor.  The actress was not very believeable.  I did not enjoy her performance. Ben Gazara fit his role perfectly. Storyline a little weak.

I recently saw this movie on TV and was pleasantly surprised. Jeff Fahey and a stellar cast deliver strong performances and make this thriller work. If you like action,suspense,romance and unexpected endings then this is a movie you will enjoy. A clever plot coupled with an outstanding music score will treat you to an hour and a half of viewing and listening pleasure. A good solid 4 stars. Unfortunately, it is not yet out on DVD but well worth watching. Enjoy!
